text: Bumetopia flavomarmorata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1947. It is known from the Philippines.BioLib.cz - Bumetopia flavomarmorata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1947
title: Bumetopia flavomarmorata
